title: Newly formed 5v5 team LF Mid-laner to join our circle jerk.
body:
Okay, Hit N Run is a newly formed ranked 5v5 team, we've been playing together for a little while now and have decided to make a 5s ranked team. We however are looking for a mid-laner, we have ADC, support, JGL and top, we all like our roles and lanes currently we're just missing a good synergised mid-laner. We use skype to communicate most of the time and we're mostly here for a good time, if we manage to push rating that would be great and we may become serious but for now, we're all here for a good time, have a good laugh and play a few rounds. My IGN is McGaw so add me if you're interested in seeing if you're good with the team and we'll see where we go from there.

Life is all about fun, if you're not having fun, what is the point??? 

ILY <3

replies.body: Nah guys, I think we're alright now. Thank you all for trying, we're having a lot of fun at the moment. Feel free to add me I'm always keen for a game.
Join us! You'll live in peace!{{champion:74}}
Added, ign Blissed chat in game man :)
Hi m not a great mid laner but I'm in for a good laugh. I can mid though to an extent.
sry man you must be lvl 30 to play in ranked teams
